name: Sundays Shady - Elastic Waist Boardshort
description:
Fabric: Recycler 4-way stretch 90% Recycled polyester 10% elastane blend fabric
A high performance fabric made from recycled PET plastic bottles
The perfect combination of performance and comfort
Coating: Micro Repel water repellent coating for a light weight and quick drying fabric
Fit: Layback, a modern fit 
Waist: Elastic lasso waist
Outseam: 13" outseam, short length
Pockets: Side pockets
Closure: Drawcord closure
Branding: 1 x cut 'n' sew panel features the colours of the Koori flag with the sun representing the Stingray a lead symbol for the band but also an acknowledgment of country and the connection this has with both the band and the brands heritage.
The other leg features taping detail with unique art by Billabong x KSR band member Dimathaya Burarrwanga, inspired by his culture, his home and his obsession with "living, hunting and fishing in boardshorts
Other Features: Equally perfect for a lounge on the beach or a quick shred
